extends java.lang.Object

      • getApplications

        public java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Application> getApplications(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                  java.lang.String userName,
                                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> statuses,
                                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                                  int page,
                                                                                  int limit,
                                                                                  boolean descending,
                                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys)
                                                                           throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get Applications based on user parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - name for configuration (optional)
        userName - The user who created the application (optional)
        statuses - The statuses of the applications (optional)
        tags - The set of tags you want the command for.
        page - The page to start one (optional)
        limit - the max number of results to return per page (optional)
        descending - Whether results returned in descending or ascending order (optional)
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by (optional)
        Returns:
        All applications matching the criteria
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - For any error
